word_mean: 丝球期：第一次减数分裂前期，此时核仁及核膜消失，纺锤丝形成

sentence.Network_en: Diakinesis The last stage of the PROPHASE in the first division of MEIOSIS.
sentence.Network_cn: 终变期:减数分裂第一次分裂前期中的最后一个阶段.

sentence.Network_en: The nucleus in shrinking cytoplasm of microspore mother cell enters into diakinesis stage .16.
sentence.Network_cn: 收缩的小孢子母细胞中核进入减数分裂终变期.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...终变期编辑终变期(diakinesis)前期I的最后一个阶段，又称再凝集期(recondensation stage)。此期染色质又被包装压缩成染色体。大多数核仁消失，四分体均匀地分布在核中。染色体交叉逐步向染色.
diaheliotropism 横向趋光性diakinesis 终变期，浓缩期dial ①刻度盘，标度②地阿尔

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from dia- 'through, across' + Greek kinēsis 'motion'

means.word_mean: 1. the final stage of the prophase of meiosis
